details: Morning sicknessThis drug is highly recommended for the persistent VOMITING OF PREGNANCY. Gastric disturbances, fickle appetite, nausea, water brash, bitter taste. CONSTIPATION. Nausea during menstruation. Nausea, WORSE ANY MOTION. AVERSE TO ALL FOOD. BETTER, lying on back.
name: Symphoricarpus racemosa
dosage: Second and third potency. 200th has proved curative.
